connect_account.title: Connect your Facebook account
connect_account.description: Connect with Facebook to get your products into your own Facebook Shop.

business_manager.title: Business manager
business_manager.description: Connect with Facebook manager you use to manage Facebook page, accounts ,and product catalog, You need to be an admin to be able to connect a business manager.

domain_verification.title: Domain verification
domain_verification.description: Verify your Facebook domain, so they can define that you're the owner of it

facebook_page.title: Facebook page
facebook_page.description: Connect with Facebook pages you want to sell or post ads. You need to be an admin to be able to connect a page.

data_sharing.title: Data sharing (Facebook Pixel)
data_sharing.description: Facebook collects data about your customers so they can use it to retarget them through your ads, which helps your business grow.

commerce_account.title: Facebook commerce account
commerce_account.description: Create a Facebook commerce account to start selling on Facebook, Instagram, or both once you have one. You'll be able to customize your Facebook shop

terms_and_conditions.title: Terms & conditions
terms_and_conditions.description: You need to accept Facebook terms of service

connect_account.title: Connect your Google account
connect_account.description: Connect with Google to get your products into your own Google merchant center.

payment_method.title: Confirm some details
payment_method.description: Activate payment method so Google can make sure your store is trustworthy

method.title: Payment
method.description: Add payment method for your store, so your customers can pay you online

method.title: Pages
method.description: Add a refund policy and terms of service

method.title: Contact
method.description: Confirm you have 2 contact methods on your online store

tikTok.title: Setup TikTok sales
tikTok.mega_title: You are about to add TikTok

privacy_notice.text: To erase your customers' personal information from TikTok, Remove the app. After 48 hours, a request will be sent to TikTok to erase this data.

agreement_terms.text: By proceeding, you are agreeing to the

create_account.title: Connect your Business TikTok account
create_account.description: Connect with TikTok to get your products into your own TikTok Shop.

business_account.title: Business Account
business_account.description: Dookan uses your TikTok for business account to access your TikTok Ads Manager Account.

data_sharing.title: Data sharing (TikTok Pixel)
data_sharing.description: TikTok collect data about your customers so they can use it to retarget them through your ads, which help your business grow.

payment_method.title: Payment
payment_method.description: A valid payment method is required to run ads on TikTok and use admcredits. Go to TikTok ads manager to set up your payments.

target_location.title: Target Location
target_location.description: Select the location where your customer are. TikTok willdeliver your ads to users in those target locations to help you maximize your budget.

snapchat.title: Setup Snapchat sales
snapchat.mega_title: You are about to add Snapchat

privacy_notice.text: To erase your customers' personal information from Snapchat, Remove the app. After 48 hours, a request will be sent to Snapchat to erase this data.

agreement_terms.text: By proceeding, you are agreeing to the

create_account.title: Connect your Business Snapchat account
create_account.description: Connect with Snapchat to get your products into your own Snapchat Shop.

business_account.title: Business Account
business_account.description: Dookan uses your Snapchat for business account to access your Snapchat Ads Manager Account.

data_sharing.title: Data sharing (Snapchat Pixel)
data_sharing.description: Snapchat collect data about your customers so they can use it to retarget them through your ads, which help your business grow.

mailchimp.title: Setup Mailchimp sales
mailchimp.mega_title: You are about to add Mailchimp

privacy_notice.text: To erase your customers' personal information from Mailchimp, Remove the app. After 48 hours, a request will be sent to Mailchimp to erase this data.

agreement_terms.text: By proceeding, you are agreeing to the

note_1.text_1: Important: Before you begin, you must archive (not just pause) any automated
note_1.text_2: to prevent redundant welcome messages from being sent to your Shopify customers. Other types of automations will be migrated automatically.

note_2.text_1: Manager access or higher will be required to configure this integration. Learn more about Mailchimp

note_3.text_1: Note that any existing abandoned cart email sequences will not migrate and need to be recreated after installation.

note_4.text_1: To save time, you can save your existing welcome and abandoned cart emails as a
note_4.text_2: to speed up the recreation process.

note_5.text_1: If you're syncing to an existing audience,
note_5.text_2: of that audience, just to be safe.

create_account.title: Connect to your Mailchimp account
create_account.description: or connect to your existing Mailchimp Account to authenticate and sync to Mailchimp. Learn more about installation.

audience_select.title: Select an audience
audience_select.description: Choose an audience to sync your customers and their purchase data to Mailchimp. Please note, you can only connect one store with one Mailchimp audience.

note_2.text_1: Manager access or higher will be required to configure this integration. Learn more about Sendgrid's

note_4.text_1: To save time, you can save your existing welcome and abandoned cart emails as a
note_4.text_2: to speed up the recreation process.

connect_API.title: Connect to your Sendgrid account
connect_API.description: or connect to your existing Sendgrid Account to authenticate and sync to Sendgrid. Learn more about installation.

audience_select.title: Select an audience
audience_select.description: Choose an audience to sync your customers and their purchase data to Sendgrid. Please note, you can only connect one store with one Sendgrid audience.
